channel.title: Computer Vision on Abnormal Distributions
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on Abnormal Distributions

item.title: Object detection using AWS SageMaker and GluonCV
item.description: This post briefly describes how I built an object detection model using AWS SageMaker and GluonCV to detect Blue Cross Blue Shield logos. Full code and notebooks can be found in the GitHub repo. Collecting and preparing training images To collect images for training, I searched Google for “bluecross blueshied logo”, “bluecross blueshield letter”, “bluecross blueshield building”, “bluecross blueshield shirt”, “bluecross blueshield event”, “bluecross blueshield shirt”, and “bluecross blueshield bus”. The logos in the images varied in size, shape, angle, clarity, and background.
